law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Executive Director" means the Executive Director of the Governor's Office of Crime Control and Prevention.
"Fund" means the School Bus Safety Enforcement Fund.
"Law enforcement agency" means the Department of State Police, the police department of a county or municipal corporation, or a sheriff's office.
"School vehicle" has the meaning stated in § 11-154 of the Transportation Article.
